textselector.name: STATUS
textselector.description: Items which are not public need to be deactivated using the 'deactivate' command in the webmatrix system.

cropimage.name: IMG
cropimage.description: JPG or GIF image: 440 pixels wide, flexible height, ideally 165 pixels high

subject_checkboxgroup.name: SUBJECT
subject_checkboxgroup.description: Choose a subject for this newsitem. It will appear as recent news on the relevant subject homepage / course page.

checkboxgroup.name: TARGET
checkboxgroup.description: Choose an audience for this news item.

dhtmltext.name: CONTENT
dhtmltext.description: Text formats: introductory text (Heading 3), headlines (Heading 4), paragraphs (Normal)
